item.title: Probability
item.description: This includes the notes related to probability. This note contains parts that I learnt from the Probability and Statistics course of Georgia Tech university’s edx.org

item.title: Differential Equation
item.description: This includes the notes related to differential equation. A differential equation of simple form 𝑑𝑦/𝑑𝑡 + 𝑃 (𝑡)𝑦 = 𝑓(𝑡) explains how the change in one variable (independent variable) affects the other dependent variable. Differential equation helps to explain how the systems changes over time.
